Uses of Package
org.apache.juneau.server.annotation

  • Packages that use org.apache.juneau.server.annotation 
    Package Description
    org.apache.juneau.microservice
    Juneau Cloud Microservice API
    org.apache.juneau.microservice.resources
    Predefined Microservice Resources
    org.apache.juneau.server
    REST Servlet API
    org.apache.juneau.server.annotation
    REST servlet annotations
    org.apache.juneau.server.jena
    RET servlet API with Jena components
    org.apache.juneau.server.remoteable
    Remoteable service API
  • Classes in org.apache.juneau.server.annotation used by org.apache.juneau.microservice 
    Class and Description
    RestResource
    Optionally used to associate metadata on an instance of RestServlet.
  • Classes in org.apache.juneau.server.annotation used by org.apache.juneau.microservice.resources 
    Class and Description
    Attr
    Annotation that can be applied to a parameter of a RestMethod annotated method to identify it as a variable in a URL path pattern converted to a POJO.
    Content
    Annotation that can be applied to a parameter of a RestMethod annotated method to identify it as the HTTP request body converted to a POJO.
    Param
    Annotation that can be applied to a parameter of a RestMethod annotated method to identify it as a URL query parameter converted to a POJO.
    PathRemainder
    Annotation that can be applied to a parameter of a RestMethod annotated method to identify it as the URL parameter remainder after a path pattern match.
    Properties
    Annotation that can be applied to a parameter of a RestMethod annotated method to identify the request-duration properties object for the current request.
    RestMethod
    Identifies a REST Java method on a RestServlet implementation class.
    RestResource
    Optionally used to associate metadata on an instance of RestServlet.
  • Classes in org.apache.juneau.server.annotation used by org.apache.juneau.server 
    Class and Description
    RestMethod
    Identifies a REST Java method on a RestServlet implementation class.
    RestResource
    Optionally used to associate metadata on an instance of RestServlet.
  • Classes in org.apache.juneau.server.annotation used by org.apache.juneau.server.annotation 
    Class and Description
    Inherit
    Inheritance values for the RestMethod.serializersInherit() and RestMethod.parsersInherit() annotations.
  • Classes in org.apache.juneau.server.annotation used by org.apache.juneau.server.jena 
    Class and Description
    RestMethod
    Identifies a REST Java method on a RestServlet implementation class.
    RestResource
    Optionally used to associate metadata on an instance of RestServlet.
  • Classes in org.apache.juneau.server.annotation used by org.apache.juneau.server.remoteable 
    Class and Description
    Attr
    Annotation that can be applied to a parameter of a RestMethod annotated method to identify it as a variable in a URL path pattern converted to a POJO.
    RestMethod
    Identifies a REST Java method on a RestServlet implementation class.
